reviewsJson.markdown:
10/2017 | Taro 1101 

"Highly Concentrated" | Recommended ratio: 3%-5%, this format is not fixed, customers can adjust it based on personal preference" - HealthCabin.net

 

Health Cabin Facebook Messenger Response 10/17: 
"Tobacco flavors: 3-5% | Non-Tobacco flavors:5-10% | No - Diacetyl or Acetyl Propionyl"
- facebook.com/HealthCabin

 

üîπHealth Cabin Concentrate Image: Cleaned* "Eddo" Taro?
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 
üìë "Taro is a starchy root vegetable that has a sweet, nutty flavor‚Äîa flavor and texture 
that seems a combination of chestnuts and potatoes...
‚ñ†  Large taro roots can be fibrous, dry, and mealy when cooked but have a nutty
- sweetness ‚ñ†  Small taro or eddo will taste bland but be moister than large taro." 
- harvesttotable.com
________________________________________________
**10/17/2017**

 

SF Test:  **2%** | 60/40 | Wasp Nano | 316L SS Fused Clapton | Japanese Org.Cotton

 


‚ñ∫First Impressions - Concentrate Bottle Aroma = Very Strong | More Earthy Aroma than Taro (FE)

 

‚Ä¢ Knuckle Test:  Smell & Taste (24 Hour Steep ‚úî)

- Aroma Intensity - Strong | Earthy & "Rooty" | "Nutiness" - Not Easily Identifiable 

- Mod.Sweet | Full & Heavy "Earthy" Flavor / "Rooty-ness" - Strong with Mild "Green" Note

 

üîπ Similar to Large Taro Root | Compare to Freshly Cut & Cooked Taro @ Wk1
________________________________________________
**10/24/2017  (1 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ Tester Bottle Aroma: Aroma Intensity Strong but less "Rough" | Earthy & Rooty Dominant


‚Ä¢ Knuckle: Sweet | Creamy, Smooth, with a *Hint of Buttery Nut* |  Green & Earthy * Root - Dominant / Starch = Identifiable 


‚Ä¢ Vape: Flavor Intensity - Strong | Mod.Green* Earthy & Starchy Root (Dominant) with  Potato-esque Aroma Identifiable 

---| Smooth, Slightly Gritty Heavy Body | Dense Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Hint of Tartness & Dryness - Overall Smooth

‚Ä¢ Imitation Similarity = Meaty Flesh of a Raw, Freshly Cut Large Taro vs Cooked

_________________
**10/31/2017 (2  Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ Tester Bottle: Unchanged from Wk 1 
--- Aroma Intensity Strong | Mod. Earthy & Rooty Taro

‚Ä¢ Knuckle: Overall Unchanged from Wk 1 | ‚Üì in Gritty Aroma = More *Green

‚Ä¢ Vape: Flavor Intensity - Strong | Mod.Green* / Earthy & Starchy Root (Dominant) with 
Potato-esque Aroma Identifiable | Mild Creamy-ness* 
---| Body & Mouth Feel = Overall Unchanged / ‚Üì in Gritty-ness

 

‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: ‚Üì in Tartness
____________________________________________
**11/11/2017 ( 3.4 Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL** ü•á

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ Tester Bottle: Unchanged from Wks 1 & 2

Aroma Intensity Strong | Mod. Earthy & Rooty Taro


‚Ä¢ Knuckle: Unchanged From Wk 2

Sweet | Mod. Creamy & Smooth | Greenish* Earthy Root - Dominant with Mild Starch, | *Hint of Buttery Nut*


‚Ä¢ Vape: Flavor Intensity - Strong | Mild Sweetness | Raw Taro Root | Mod.Green* / Earthy & Starchy Root (Dominant) w* Soft Potato-y qualities| Mild Creamy-ness*
 
---| Med. Body |Smooth, Semi-Gritty/Watery Coated Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None 

‚Ä¢ Grittiness decreased from Bold > Mild | *Natural Taro from Ground 

‚Ä¢  Pastries, Bakeries, Desserts 
___________________

Estimate - ‚ö†Ô∏è Very Potent & Bold

‚ñ∫ Usage:   .05 - .15% min  | .25 - .5% med   | .75 - 1% max

Mix: .15 - .25%
